pr_title: RM#25898 : Manuf. order bugfix, no longer diplay unavaible tracking numbers

timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -50,6 +50,7 @@
 - LEAVE REQUEST: corrected error when trying to change user.
 - EMPLOYEE: update the employee records in demo data so the creation process is finished.
 - LEAD: removed non persistable field wrongly appearing on the form view.
+- MANUFACTURING ORDER : On consumed product, no longer diplay tracking numbers if avaible quantity equals 0.

timeline.author: ale-axelor

timeline.bodyText: Small nitpick but you don't have to create a trackingNumbers variable and you can instead return trackingNumberRepo.all().filter(domain).fetch();
timeline.author: ale-axelor

timeline.message:
Manuf. order bugfix : no longer diplay unavaible tracking numbers

On manuf-order-form > consumedProductsPanel > consumedStockMoveLineList > "split by tracking numbers" button
No longer displays tracknig numbers when avaibleQty equals 0

RM#25898
